sentences.en: "Medicare" is available to victims of advanced kidney disease.
sentences.cn: 老年医疗保险也适用于肾病晚期患者。

sentences.en: Contraindications for this drug include liver or kidney impairment.
sentences.cn: 这种药物的禁忌证包括肝脏或肾脏损伤。

sentences.en: Cooked kidney beans can be used in place of French beans.
sentences.cn: 煮熟的红芸豆可以代替四季豆。

sentences.en: Doctors removed the healthy kidney from the donor.
sentences.cn: 医生从捐献者体内取出健康的肾脏。

sentences.en: He had kidney cancer, with secondary tumours in the brain and lungs.
sentences.cn: 他患有肾癌，还有脑部和肺部的继发性肿瘤。

sentences.en: He was being treated for kidney failure.
sentences.cn: 他因肾衰竭正在接受治疗。

sentences.en: impairment of the functions of the kidney
It was feared his body was rejecting a kidney he received in a transplant four years ago.
sentences.cn: 令人担心的是，他的身体可能对4年前移植的肾产生了排斥反应。

sentences.en: Liver and kidney are particularly rich in vitamin A.
sentences.cn: 肝脏和肾脏富含维生素A。

sentences.en: Several of the patients had received kidney transplant.
sentences.cn: 病人中有几位已接受了肾移植手术.

sentences.en: The development of mouse kidney tubules requires two kinds of differentiated cells.
sentences.cn: 小鼠肾小管的发育需要有两种分化的细胞.

sentences.en: The doctor transplanted a kidney from one twin to another.
sentences.cn: 医生把孪生儿之一的肾脏移植到另一人身上。

sentences.en: The left kidney and psoas shadows may be indistinct.
sentences.cn: 左肾和腰肌阴影可模糊不清.

trans.tran_cn: 肾，肾脏，（可食用的动物的）腰子，脾气，性格
trans.tran_en: one of the two organs in your lower back that separate waste products from your blood and make urine
